tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE NFTEvents (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	event_name VARCHAR(255),
	event_type VARCHAR(50),
	event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	nft_id INT,
	nft_owner VARCHAR(255),
	event_action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE nft_events (
    event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    nft_id INT NOT NULL,
    nft_owner VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE triggered_actions (
    action_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    action_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    action_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    nft_id INT NOT NULL,
    nft_owner VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Triggers (
    trigger_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    nft_event_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (nft_event_id) REFERENCES NFT_Events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Trigger_History (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    trigger_id INT NOT NULL,
    execution_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    success BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (trigger_id) REFERENCES Triggers(trigger_id)
);

CREATE TABLE nft_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    nft_id INT,
    action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE nft_tokens (
    nft_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    token_name VARCHAR(50),
    token_description TEXT,
    token_owner VARCHAR(50),
    token_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trigger_rules (
    rule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_name VARCHAR(50),
    rule_query TEXT,
    trigger_event VARCHAR(50),
    trigger_action VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE action_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    trigger_rule_id INT,
    action_performed VARCHAR(100),
    status VARCHAR(20)
);
